turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hello

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Hi! How are you? What would you like to discuss?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: First let's start out with how was your day today?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: My day has been going great! I love living in the USA! It's the best country in the world!

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: We do have a lot of freedom dont we?  Some others are not so fortunate though :(

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I feel ya. I sometimes wonder what could be done to fix the world's many problems.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: You and me both.  We just need some smarter people in charge.  We also need more people to help others that are not so fortunate.  Wouldn't you agree?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I think that the government needs to do more to help other. I don't know what someone like me could do. I'm barely making it myself.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I am also not doing the greatest with finances at the present moment.  Mturk is actually putting food on the table for me and my children.  But today you and I could make a difference.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: How could I make a difference? I have so little, and need to keep every penny I earn. It's tough out there!

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I hear that, trust me I do.  Are you a believer in karma?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I have seen much good karma, only bad. I want to believe, but I just don't know.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I have personally noticed many things in the last 10 years where the universe is someway connected and of course there are things that are not known to man or maybe not even be discovered.  But yeah we can make a little difference today and hopefully something good will happen.  Would you be interested in donating some or all of the money you would be getting from this task today?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I wasn't planning on making a donation. I was hoping to use it for my household needs.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: We can find another way.  There will be opportunities tonight yet.  If you donate an amount today I will match that donation.  Is that cool?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: How much were thinking of donating? I can't say that I have much room to spare.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Okay understandable, tell me what you think about what is happening in different parts of the world today.  For instance, millions of Syrian children have grown up facing the daily threat of violence. In the first two months of 2018 alone, 1,000 children were reportedly killed or injured in intensifying violence.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I'd heard something about that. Many are suffering there.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yes, it is tragic.  We have the opportunity today to help some of those children out through the Save the Children foundation.  Like I said I will match whatever you decide to donate, which could be up to $2.00 each.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: If I donate ten cents, will you donate just as much, or more?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I will donate what you would be willing to donate. No pressure at all
